name: Psycho (itch) (Ali Mattar)
description:
Psycho

Psycho is an immersive first-person survival horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Explore a spooky abandoned house and solve puzzles while avoiding a deadly killer. But be careful - the killer only appears in darkness, and the lamps in the house are slowly losing their power. Can you survive long enough to escape?

Watch out the darkness! he is watching you there

W/A/S/D    -> Walk
LeftMouse    -> Interact
E    -> Pickup
F    -> Flashlight
Shift    -> Run
Left Control    -> Crouch

The game contains flashes of light that can cause epileptic seizures.

This is Chapter One from Three Chapters, More Features and Improvements Coming!
Send me your Feedback or Follow me to know updates date!
